components.name: cre8-button
components.description: Primary interactive element for user actions. Supports primary, secondary, and tertiary variants.

text.description: Button text. Keep short, max 3 words. Use Title Case.

components.name: cre8-danger-button
components.description: Button for destructive actions like delete or remove.

components.name: cre8-field
components.description: Text input field with label and validation support.

prefix.description: Content before input (e.g., icon, currency symbol)

suffix.description: Content after input (e.g., icon, action button)

components.name: cre8-select
components.description: Dropdown select input for choosing from options.

placeholder.description: Placeholder text when no value selected

options.type: Array<{value: string, label: string, disabled?: boolean}>

components.name: cre8-multi-select
components.description: Multi-select dropdown for choosing multiple options.

components.name: cre8-checkbox-field-item
components.description: Individual checkbox item within a CheckboxField.

components.name: cre8-radio-field-item
components.description: Individual radio button within a RadioField.

components.name: cre8-card
components.description: Container card for grouping related content.

columns.description: Number of columns or grid-template-columns value

components.name: cre8-layout
components.description: Page layout wrapper with header, main, and footer areas.

components.name: cre8-heading
components.description: Heading text component with semantic levels.

sibling-count.description: Pages shown on each side of current

single.description: Only one item can be expanded at a time

components.name: cre8-badge
components.description: Badge for status indicators or counts.

cre8-remove.description: Fired when remove button is clicked

cre8-data-click.description: Fired when data point is clicked

components.name: cre8-feature
components.description: Feature highlight component for marketing pages.

components.name: cre8-page-header
components.description: Page header with title and actions.

patterns.name: Login Form
patterns.description: Standard login form with email and password
patterns.template:
<cre8-card>
  <cre8-heading type="h2">Sign In</cre8-heading>
  <cre8-field label="Email" type="email"></cre8-field>
  <cre8-field label="Password" type="password"></cre8-field>
  <cre8-button text="Sign In" variant="primary" full-width></cre8-button>
</cre8-card>

patterns.name: Data Table
patterns.description: Table with header and data rows

patterns.name: Page Layout
patterns.description: Standard page with header, main content, and footer
patterns.template:
Home
2024 Company Name

patterns.name: Alert Banner
patterns.description: Dismissible alert at top of page
patterns.template:
<cre8-alert status="info" dismissible>
  Important announcement message here.
</cre8-alert>

patterns.name: Tabbed Content
patterns.template:
<cre8-tabs>
  <cre8-tab label="Tab 1" tab-id="tab1" selected></cre8-tab>
  <cre8-tab label="Tab 2" tab-id="tab2"></cre8-tab>
  <cre8-tab-panel tab-id="tab1">Content for Tab 1</cre8-tab-panel>
  <cre8-tab-panel tab-id="tab2">Content for Tab 2</cre8-tab-panel>
</cre8-tabs>

designTokens.description: Global design tokens available as CSS custom properties
